name: Sri Says
body:

## Book Highlights
- [Zero To One](https://medium.com/@srisays/zero-to-one-b0e0389b3115)

## How to Start a Startup - Y Combinator
 
My takeaways from the [CS183b - Stanford/Y Combinator class, Fall 2014](http://startupclass.samaltman.com/)
- [Week #1 - Idea, Product, Team & Execution](https://medium.com/@srisays/how-to-start-a-startup-w01-cfd3aadc2880)
- [Week #2 - Product, Customers, Growth](https://medium.com/how-to-start-a-startup-takeaways/how-to-start-a-startup-w02-c0bd0277572d)
- [Week #3 - Retention & Growth](https://medium.com/how-to-start-a-startup-takeaways/how-to-start-a-startup-w03-d1be2439228e)
- [Week #4 - Product. Doing things that donâ€™t scale, PR](https://medium.com/how-to-start-a-startup-takeaways/how-to-start-a-startup-w04-5042dc8ff199)
- [Week #5 - How to raise money. Company Culture](https://medium.com/how-to-start-a-startup-takeaways/how-to-start-a-startup-w05-7204003c9c21)
- [Week #6 - Building a Team. Building for the Enterprise](https://medium.com/how-to-start-a-startup-takeaways/how-to-start-a-startup-w06-b926a9843eab)
- [Week #7 - How to be a great founder. How to operate](https://medium.com/how-to-start-a-startup-takeaways/how-to-start-a-startup-w07-13f52305b41f)
- [Week #8 - How to manage. How to run user interviews](https://medium.com/how-to-start-a-startup-takeaways/how-to-start-a-startup-w08-5fd0e64596a0)
- [Week #9 - Legal and Accounting Basics](https://medium.com/how-to-start-a-startup-takeaways/how-to-start-a-startup-w09-943959409dbf)
- [Week #10 Part 1 - Sales and Marketing. Perfecting the pitch](https://medium.com/how-to-start-a-startup-takeaways/how-to-start-a-startup-w10-part-1-e5b51000d061)
- [Week #10 Part 2 - Later stage advice](https://medium.com/how-to-start-a-startup-takeaways/how-to-start-a-startup-w10-part-2-22cc2437b407)
